comments.body: Why do we make it so general as a callback function? Shall we just call `requireExactMatchedPartitionSpec` inside this method?

We shouldn't call it in all cases, for instance, we shouldn't call it for `SHOW PARTITIONS`.

I thought about alternative solution by passing a flag and check the flag but just passing the function looks more clearly and beauty.
